document.masterDocTitle: An annotated checklist of the Scarabaeoidea (Insecta: Coleoptera) of the Guianas

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An annotated checklist of the Scarabaeoidea (Insecta: Coleoptera) of the Guianas

bibRefCitation.author: Mannerheim
bibRefCitation.refString: Mannerheim, C. G. 1829. Description de quarante nouvelles especes de scarabeides du Bresil; avec figures. Memoires de la Societe Imperiale des Naturalistes de Moscou 7: 29 - 80. [Nouveaux Memoires de la Societe Imperiale des Naturalistes de Moscou 1: 29 - 80.]

subSubSection.paragraph:
Note 1. Five presently recognized subspecies of
Canthon ( Canthon ) virens
have been described, three of which (may) occur in the research area. The other two are
C. ( C. ) virens paraguayanus Balthasar, 1939
(recorded from Brazil , Paraguay ) and
C. ( C. ) virens virens ( Mannerheim, 1829 )
(recorded from Brazil ).

Note 2. There has been much confusion regarding the status of
Canthon virens
, its various subspecies and the synonym
C. conformis
.

Subspecies
Canthon ( Canthon ) virens chalybaeus Blanchard, 1846

Note.
Canthon virens chalybaeus
is only mentioned for the Guianas in A. Schmidt (1922a: 74) and Blackwelder (1944: 198) (as
C. conformis
from French Guiana ). Because this is a single record of considerable age, and because there is already another subspecies known from French Guiana , we consider this record doubtful and in need of confirmation.

Subspecies
Canthon ( Canthon ) virens scrutator Balthasar, 1939

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Canthon scrutator Balthasar 1939e: 233
( French Guiana , Brazil (NA))

subSubSection.paragraph:
Subspecies
Canthon ( Canthon ) virens surinamensis Endrödi, 1962
